name: Silver Moonlight
description:
The kingdom of Lusnistan under the ingenious leadership of Queen Elysabeth was once a prosperous kingdom until the arrival of monsters called Orcs. No one knew where these creatures came from, and none were prepared for the terror that they spawned. With bloodlust and invincible strength, they attacked and buried everything they passed.

After many consecutive victories, the fierce Orc warriors began to attack the capital of the kingdom of Lusnistan. The fall of the kingdom of Lusnistan is now only a matter of time.

Now, with no other choice, Queen Elysabeth and the Royal Knight Typhainne must retreat into the forest in search of new allies in the hope of one day restoring the kingdom of Lusnistan.

Silver Moonlight is a Strategy RPG game where you play as female knights fighting against the fiercest monsters. With diverse gameplay along with an engaging storyline, the game will not let you down with its vast and challenging exploration. Combined with a unique and exciting skill set, the game's combat system will immerse you in exciting battles with the fiercest and most powerful bosses.

FEATURES:


  • Intriguing Storyline.
  • Female Protagonist.
  • In-depth Battle System.
  • Beautiful Graphics.
  • Attractive Gameplay.
  • High Difficulty.
  • Diverse and Attractive Skill System.


Elysabeth is the Queen of the kingdom of Lusnistan. She has been taught magic since childhood. With her intelligence, she learned the magic of light which is extremely powerful. With her ingenious leadership, the kingdom of Lusnistan developed rapidly and achieved unprecedented prosperity. However, the kingdom's prosperity brought it to the attention of the invaders. With the invasion of ferocious Orc monsters, the fall of the kingdom of Lusnistan is only a matter of time. With no other choice, she had to flee into the forest with Typhainne in search of new allies in the hope of one day restoring her kingdom.


Typhainne is the royal knight of the kingdom of Lusnistan. Born into a noble family, from a young age, she was well trained to be a talented leader. With ingenious leadership and iron will, she defeated the most powerful enemies to bring glory to the kingdom of Lusnistan. With the invasion of ferocious Orc monsters, the fall of the kingdom of Lusnistan is only a matter of time. With no other choice, she persuaded Queen Elysabeth to run away with her into the forest in search of new allies in the hope of one day restoring her kingdom.


Wynifreed is an invincible knight. With the power of fire, she can burn all enemies easily with her scorching sword strokes. In her youth she fought the most powerful enemies in the places she passed. She later decided to retreat to the forest to practice more of her skills. When Queen Elysabeth asked her to help defeat the monsters that ravaged the kingdom of Lusnistan, she agreed to help because she didn't want to see the monsters wreak havoc everywhere they went so easily.


Helena is a knight of the forest. Born and raised in the forest, she learned to control nature from an early age. With the power of wind, she can slash all enemies in a flash and no one can dodge her attack. She has been with Wynifreed for many years and the two consider each other like sisters. When Queen Elysabeth asked her to help defeat the monsters that ravaged the kingdom of Lusnistan, she agreed to help because she didn't want to see the monsters wreak havoc everywhere they went so easily.
